content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, nice to meet you. I am sure you will love the apartment. Now, about the rental price, I am looking for a monthly rent of €1200 for this newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It is close to all important facilities, so I believe this is a reasonable price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate the offer, Mister Schmidt, but I am a student and I am looking for a more student-friendly price. Could we perhaps negotiate a lower rent?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Sure, Max. I am willing to hear your offer. Please make a counter-offer, and I will let you know if I can accept it.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: How about €1000 per month? I think that would be a fair price for a student like me.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I understand your situation, Max, but €1000 is quite low for the location and amenities of this apartment. I am willing to be flexible, but not that much. How about €1100? It is a good deal for a student like you.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: €1100 is more in line with what I was expecting. It would be a great help to me as a student. I agree to the price of €1100 Euro!
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [1100] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Excellent, Max! I am glad we could reach an agreement. This is a great deal for you, considering the location and the quality of the apartment. I hope you will be happy here. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I am very satisfied with the agreement. For now, there is nothing else I need assistance with. If I have any further questions or concerns, I will contact you. Until then, have a great day!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Max. I am here if you need anything. Enjoy your stay in the city center! TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
